RETURN

SCREAM CAMPAIGN

Jun 1, 2017 promo OOH digital

CREATIVE BRIEF

Scream turned into a TV series! We were tasked with a full campaign of promo look, digital, social, out of home and also the Scream Aftershow look and full packaging.
